about_the_game:
My Furry Protogen 2 continues the story of the protogen scientist Juno and her love—our main hero. After two years of training, preparation, and research, they have finally uncovered clues that could lead them to their enemy. With some outside assistance, new equipment, and upgraded armor for Juno, they are now more than ready to continue their mission!

Their relationship has also grown stronger; they love each other deeply and spend all their time together. However, even their bond faces some minor challenges. While they typically resolve these issues easily, things are heating up as their interests and hobbies begin to diverge. Will they be able to overcome this stage of their relationship, or will it lead to further complications?

Join Juno and our hero as they explore new planets and confront fresh dangers in My Furry Protogen 2!

Features:

  • A cute female protogen!

  • HD, fully original artwork

  • A relaxing atmosphere

  • A touch of personal drama, as usual

name: My Furry Protogen 2 🐾

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: After every night comes a new dawn, filled with hope and light. As the adventure of our heroes continues, let’s discover what lies ahead!
